item.title: Bitcoin Price Rally Delayed
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Rally Delayed

Bitcoin price has faked advance, and now proceeds to retest the consolidation zone near $570 (Bitstamp). This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay. Read the full analysis here. Not a member? Join now.

item.title: Bitcoin Core 0.13.0 Released!
item.description:
Bitcoin Core 0.13.0 Released!

We're pleased to announce the official release of Bitcoin Core 0.13.0. During the six-month development cycle leading to this release, dozens of contributors have made hundreds of notable improvements to Bitcoin Core.

item.title: Bitcoin.com Price Watch: Bulls About to Charge? - Bitcoin News
item.description:
Bitcoin.com Price Watch: Bulls About to Charge? - Bitcoin News

The price of bitcoin has been trending upwards this past week, giving a bullish sentiment to traders. The price per BTC is $584 USD at press time, and it looks as though we may see more spikes.

item.description: Wings Team Offers a Standard for Safe DAO's

item.title: US Congress Candidate Tiffany Hayden on Dark Side of Ditching Banks for Bitcoin
item.description:
US Congress Candidate Tiffany Hayden on Dark Side of Ditching Banks for Bitcoin

Leaving the banking system and only using Bitcoin can have several distinct advantages. It can save banking fees, protect against identity theft, maintain financial independence, and remove the fear of having one's funds shut down in the case of controversial activity. However, losing the banking system is not without its drawbacks.

item.title: CCN Catches up with the CEO of CHBTC, One of China's Largest Exchanges
item.description:
CCN Catches up with the CEO of CHBTC, One of China's Largest Exchanges

Hi, thank you for the interview. Many of our readers are not familiar with yourself. Could you please give us a brief introduction? Hello, I'm Dawei Lee, chief executive officer of CHBTC, which is one of the mainstream digital currency exchanges in China.

item.title: Marlin is a New Stratum OpenCL GPU Miner for SiaCoin (SC)
item.description:
Marlin is a New Stratum OpenCL GPU Miner for SiaCoin (SC)

The Siamining mining pool for SiaCoin (SC) that we have already covered a couple of times has something new and interesting for the people mining SIA. They have released a new Stratum-only OpenCL GPU miner for their mining pool that is designed to be fast, lightweight and easy to use.

item.title: South Africa Bank will open to blockchain | HolyTransaction
item.description:
South Africa Bank will open to blockchain | HolyTransaction

According to a new announcement, South Africa Bank will open to blockchain and digital currencies. During a recent speech at a cybersecurity event organized in Johannesburg, governor Lesetja Kganyago revealed that the South Africa Bank will open to blockchain and other innovations.

item.title: How come some addresses show up in search results while others don't?
item.description:
How come some addresses show up in search results while others don't?

Every (real) transaction made with Bitcoin is stored on the Blockchain. Forever. If you are able to send Bitcoins to another address without it showing up on the Blockchain, you are not sending (real) Bitcoins.
